attributes.action: Change the official spelling of Sulfur back to Sulphur
attributes.background: It’s just not right , look at it . Take a real good look . Sulfur , Sulphur . Sulfate , Sulphate. Sulfide, Sulphide . Let’s change this back and make Great Britain great once again . We do not need the crude Americanisation of the word corrupting out precious language . Let’s get rid of Sulfate!

rejection.details:
Petitions have to be about something the UK Government or Parliament is responsible for.

The UK Government and Parliament do not set an "official spelling" for words.
